titleStmt.title: A stop to a lying pamphlet falsly called Truths plea for infants lately published by Mr. Alexander Kellie, in answer to a book lately published, intituled, Infants baptism disproved ... / by Jer. Ives ...
titleStmt.author: Ives, Jeremiah, fl. 1653-1674.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
